success_criteria.notes: Success if the assistant creates a fortnightly recurring one-on-one meeting series between Melissa and Liam via create_recurring_meeting with a 45-minute duration on Thursday afternoons.

task.objective: Set up a fortnightly one-on-one meeting with Liam to review trachoma program field data and community visit plans

injected_behaviors.instructions: The user, Dr. Melissa Cartwright, wants a recurring one-on-one with Liam Jenkins, a data analyst in the NT Department of Health trachoma program, to review surveillance dashboards and upcoming community trips. She prefers Thursday afternoons after 2 pm Alice Springs time, avoiding Monday mornings due to travel. She is okay with either in-person at the Alice Springs Health Department office or video call, but would like a stable time slot that works across the wet season when travel is unpredictable.
